REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1069 reute b f BC-KEIHIN-ELECTRIC-EXPRE 03-25 0114

TEXT.TITLE: KEIHIN ELECTRIC EXPRESS ISSUES 150 MLN DLR BOND
TEXT.BODY: Keihin Electric Express Railway Co Ltd is issuing a 150 mln dlr eurobond with equity warrants due April 22, 1992 with an indicated coupon of 2-3/8 pct and priced at par, lead manager Yamaichi International (Europe) Ltd said. The non-callable bonds are guaranteed by Fuji Bank Ltd. Pricing will take place on April 1 and the exercise period is between May 18, 1987 and April 15, 1992. The indicated premium is 2-1/2 pct. Total fees of 2-1/4 pct comprise 1-1/2 pct for selling and 3/4 pct for management and underwriting. The bonds will be issued in 5,000 dlr denominations and listed in Luxembourg. REUTER
